questions.answer_description:
The Development Team may need to order the Product Backlog as they would know the most about technical limitations, risks, or dependencies between Product
Backlog Items. As User Stories is a localized practice, Scrum does not govern it or dictate the practice. How the team describes the items is up to them as long as it has enough information to be transparent and understood.
